title: Examining the association between emotional intelligence and chatbot utilization in education: A cross-sectional examination of undergraduate students in the UAE
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Sultan M. Mosleh, Fton Ali Alsaadi, Fatima Khamis Alnaqbi, Meirah Abdullrahman Alkhzaimi, Shamma Waleed Alnaqbi, Waed Mohammed Alsereidi
